name: performance-timeouts-audit
description: Review delegation streams and external calls for timeouts/backoffs and propose performance fixes.

steps.title: Identify long-running paths
steps.description: Map delegation SSE, agent-service calls, shared-rag, and external requests; note missing timeouts or aborts.

steps.title: Check backoff and retry
steps.description: Find unbounded retries or missing exponential backoff; recommend safe retry policies.

steps.title: Propose fixes
steps.description: List concrete code changes (timeouts, abort signals, buffer limits) with file/line references when possible.
